job_tasks.phrase: implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the implementation and application of Large Language Models (LLMs) and other AI technologies, which falls under the core of model implementation and usage.

job_tasks.phrase: Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts
job_tasks.justification: Investigating, evaluating, and fine-tuning performance are all activities directly related to improving and optimizing AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts for our Enterprise companies.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the actual creation and implementation of software ('Digital Hosts'), aligning with software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Working with Customer Engineers to implement connectivity between our platform and their systems.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing connectivity between systems involves software integration and development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform based on customer learnings.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing improvements to a platform directly relates to software development and iterative enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding customer goals and translating them into technical solutions, which is a key aspect of business understanding and technical consultation.

soft_skills.phrase: come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal
Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with and implementing LLMs and other AI-based technologies to create 'Digital Hosts'. Core responsibilities include fine-tuning AI models and developing software around them, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
